Text.Page:
Zulfikar Fortress is the last line of defense in the Helkan District. If the argons sack it, their next stop is Kaiator.

{@LinkCreature:78#3006} is looking for a few good soldiers. Go see what you can do to help him.

Frankly, my biggest worry are {@LinkCreature:48#29#argonomorph corpsefiends}. They're tough and brutal. Everything about them is designed to kill.

If you want to make a good impression with the Shariar, I'd start there.

Not bad! I guess you're not all talk!

The Shariar will be proud to fight at your side.
